definition: Company is wholly or majority-owned by a government entity, potentially subject to state interests over consumer interests.

criteria.description: Majority ownership (>50%) by a government or sovereign wealth fund
Operates as a government agency or state enterprise
Significant government control over operations or data

counterCriteria: Government stake reduced below 20% with no operational control

references.title: OECD State-Owned Enterprises
references.description: OECD guidelines and data on SOEs
